room_title: Escape room "Steampunk Train" by Mind Twist in Las Vegas
room_address: 3200 S Las Vegas Blvd #1835 Las Vegas, NV 89109
room_description: "Tomb of the Machina" is what the locals call this stretch of coast along the southeastern border of what used to be known as Texas. Rumor has it that an eccentric and talented inventor used to bend the rules and ethics of science with his machinations. The last time he was seen he was babbling something about living forever and set sail for an unknown destination. You are brave enough to look for him, but are you sure you want to know the truth of his fate?
